name: oh-my-claude-sisyphus
description: Multi-agent orchestration system for Claude Code - delegate tasks to specialized agents, manage todos persistently, and work until completion

plugins.name: oh-my-claude-sisyphus
plugins.description: Multi-agent orchestration system for Claude Code with 11 specialized agents, 12 slash commands, and 6 skills. Like Sisyphus, the agents persist until every task is complete.
